name: Animals Helping Hand - Helpet
description: With Helpet, you can share help quickly and free with other animal lovers. You can share the lost dog or cat ad, and you can bring the animals that need treatment to other animal lovers. You can also easily share your recovery or feeds.  Lets hope for kittens, puppies and other homeless animals! Make animal rescue shares and become savior! Cute friends are waiting for your help.  Our main aim is to create awareness on the people that other living things are not different from us.  With the helpet, we can be light and help our lovely friends who need help. The difference of Helpet is that it is not only focused on pets. To ensure that tiny creatures are seen as unique beings and to share them with them.  The animals are waiting for your support! As a helper, we organize feeding days, reach injured animals and hope them!  Our philosophy is that other creatures are not different from humans. A dog may rejoice, connect, miss and be afraid. Because they cannot speak only, we should not see them differently, and as people we must support them by listening to the goodness of our hearts.  Features:  - Treatment, Loss, Possession, Recovery and various issues - Filter by city and subject - Messaging in private chat rooms with animal lovers - Easy messaging with other animal lovers in public chat - Sharing by adding visual - Animal feed of the day - Sharing the day - Animal lover rankings - Create a profile - Follow-up and tracking feature - Share likes and comments - Learn how many people see your shares  Animal lovers will always hope as long as there is! Join the animal lovers community with Helpet and be aware of the latest help days! Help us create a more peaceful and loving space in the world with us! Together we discover animals in need.  Welcome now!
